newsitem.title: USA: California names underwriters to bond pools.
newsitem.headline: California names underwriters to bond pools.

text.p: California state Treasurer Matt Fong on Tuesday named 71 firms to six new underwriting pools that will handle state and agency bond issues over the next two years.
Firms placed in the underwriting pools will be eligible to serve as book-running manager or co-manager on bond financings, Fong said. The new pools take effect on April 1, he added.
The pools will handle state, public works board, joint powers authority and other state agency issues.
Firms new to the state's pool on negotiated offerings include:
In addition, Fong said five pools of underwriters were formed for bonds issued by state financing authorities.
In February, Fong issued a request for qualifications to form the new underwriting pools.
